parameters.query:
INSERT INTO order_state (order_item_id, order_id, seller_id, current_stage, zoho_salesorder_id, zoho_salesorder_number, zoho_salesorder_status, zoho_package_id, packaged_at)
VALUES ({{ $('Called by Parent').item.json.order_item_id }}, {{ $('Called by Parent').item.json.order_id }}, '{{ $('Called by Parent').item.json.seller_id }}', 'packaged', '{{ $('Merge SO Data').first().json.salesorder_id }}', '{{ $('Merge SO Data').first().json.salesorder_number }}', 'confirmed', '{{ $json.package_id }}', NOW())
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
  current_stage = 'packaged',
  zoho_salesorder_id = VALUES(zoho_salesorder_id),
  zoho_salesorder_number = VALUES(zoho_salesorder_number),
  zoho_salesorder_status = 'confirmed',
  zoho_package_id = VALUES(zoho_package_id),
  packaged_at = NOW()

INSERT INTO processing_log (event_id, order_item_id, seller_id, execution_id, workflow_name, stage, status, message)
VALUES ({{ $('Called by Parent').item.json.id }}, {{ $('Called by Parent').item.json.order_item_id }}, '{{ $('Called by Parent').item.json.seller_id }}', '{{ $execution.id }}', 'Process Preparing', 'packaged', 'success', 'Created SO {{ $('Merge SO Data').first().json.salesorder_id }} and Package {{ $('Merge Package Data').first().json.package_id }}')
SELECT * FROM order_state WHERE order_item_id = '{{ $('Called by Parent').item.json.order_item_id }}' LIMIT 1

json.synthesis_reason: Missing webhook - synthesized from status 3 event
